text.p: India's cricket selectors recalled opener Navjot Sidhu on Wednesday in place of Sujith Somasundar for the remaining matches of the Titan Cup triangular one-day series.
Sidhu, who walked out of the Indian team midway through the tour of England this year, completed a 50-day disciplinary ban imposed by the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) on October 14.
India have lost two of their three matches in the tournament to date but chief selector Ramakant Desai said Sidhu's recall would be the only alteration to the 14-member squad.
